name: My TOOLS
features: A wonderful home page with responsive navbar, banner carousel, realistic footer. Create a wonderful payment system. Dashboard is available. Nice backend system created by NodeJS, ExpressJs.
bodyPart1: Have beautiful Dashboard. Are you going to Dashboard you have to login with yor email. You can also login with your google account. Total two Firebase authentication implemented.  Password verification password reset option also added.
bodyPart2: Admin can added product any time. He creates a new user and make a admin. Password verification password reset option also added.
bodyPart3: Full responsive with navigation. Used Route, Private route, Dynamic route. use environment variable for password secret. Use gitignore file.
bodyPart4: What a fantastic (404) Not found page with a fenny picture. Show error message.
technologies: React.js, Express.js, CSS3, Tailwind CSS,DaisyUI, Mongodb, Heroku, Firebase.
tools: VS Code, React hook form, React Query, Stripe, Font Awesome, JWT Token etc.
